page.title: 10E.ALLINGTON SCHOOL/PARENTS
page.content: The P.T.A and the school have a good working relationship. They raise money through _ out the year for addional items the school requires. They raise this through organising various activities such as a Summer Fayre at which all children participate.Each term the children do a different project. The last one being Electricity. Parents were invited to school one evening and the children showed everyone all the experiments they had learnt. Once a year there are Parent-Teacher consultations. In the Spring Term parents have a social evening. Sports day is held at the end of the Summer Term. There is also an assembly at which the leavers perform a play to which parents are invited. A pantomine is held in the Christmas Term. The old age pensioners and playgroup are invited.
